title: Editorial Blog
description: A fully functional blog platform with Next.js, Tailwind, and Framer Motion. Features markdown support, SEO optimization, and a custom CMS handling fetch API data.

title: Preschool Template I
description: A creative and interactive website template for preschools, featuring playful animations and a child-friendly interface.

title: Preschool Template II
description: A second iteration of a preschool website focusing on elegant layout, easy navigation, and responsive design for parents.
